WorkItem.Description:
When selecting items with the SHIFT key down, the selection updates from the _previous_ clicked item to the _last_ clicked item, instead of extending from the _first_ clicked item to the _last_ clicked item.

Repro:

- Launch the SimpleSample application
- Press and hold the SHIFT key
- Left click on the element11 item
- Left click on the element13 item.
- Selection extends from 11 to 13, including 12 as expected
- While still holding the SHIFT key, left click on element15
- Selection extends from 13 to 15, but element11 and element12 are unselected, which is unexpected
WorkItem.Summary: Selection extension with SHIFT doesn't work properly
